column3: in the service of Saruman. He was a member of Uglúks raiding band that captured Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took beneath Amon Hen
column4: and drove them westwards to the eaves of Fangorn Forest. It was there that Lugdush met his end
column5: at the hands of Éomers Rohirrim.File:The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers - Lugdush.jpg

column1: Its possible that his name contains the Orcish element lug- ("fortress
column4: p. 79) seen in the name for the Dark Tower
